definitions.definition: A leisurely stroll; a recreational walk in the countryside.
A rambling; an instance of someone talking at length without direction.
A bed of shale over the seam of coal.
A section of woodland suitable for leisurely walking.
To move about aimlessly, or on a winding course
To walk for pleasure; to amble or saunter.
To talk or write incessantly, unclearly, or incoherently, with many digressions.
definitions.example: Francine has a tendency to ramble when it gets to be late in the evening.
